channel.title: solved on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in solved on Barefoot Rob

item.title: How Netlify helped me fix my website
item.description: My website stopped working recently. More accurately, Hugo stopped rendering the /blog and /journal portions of my website. The last time it worked was 2 weeks ago. I noticed that my local version of Hugo had gotten updated (*) and checked the releases.. sure enough there was a change to something related to that I had tweaked regarding indices. The problem languished for a while until I remembered that Netlify allows choosing which version of Hugo to use.

item.title: Hugo top page correctly paginates only one section
item.description: 01:05 Friday 05 July 2019 JST Nice. I got Hugo pagination figured out. Go figure that the documentation for pagination would have the right answer. https://gohugo.io/templates/pagination/ https://bitbucket.org/thunderrabbit/purehugo/src/16559a8ffa3ec74f57af7398a90f259f41972675/layouts/index.html#lines-10
